alert.note: Alert for Carlton, South St. Louis; Southern Cook, North Shore; Southern Lake, North Shore (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Dense Fog Advisory issued April 23 at 7:41AM CDT until April 23 at 12:00PM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...DENSE FOG ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON CDT TODAY... * WHAT...Visibility one quarter to one half mile in dense fog. * WHERE...In Wisconsin, Douglas, Bayfield, Ashland and Iron Counties. In Minnesota, Southern Lake, Southern Cook and Carlton and South St. Louis Counties. This includes the Tribal Lands of the Red Cliff Band, the Fond du Lac Band, the Grand Portage Reservation and the Bad River Reservation. * WHEN...Until noon CDT today. * IMPACTS...Hazardous driving conditions due to low visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The thick fog seems to be localized to the higher terrain surrounding Lake Superior.
info.instruction: If driving, slow down, use your headlights, and leave plenty of distance ahead of you.

area.areaDesc: Carlton, South St. Louis; Southern Cook, North Shore; Southern Lake, North Shore
